title: SCP-003 The dryed meat
description: Live dried meat that can kill you, like SCP-096, but attacks instantly when it sees you.

title: SCP-096 The Shy Guy
description: SCP-096 is a humanoid creature approximately 2.38 meters tall. The subject has a low amount of muscle mass, and preliminary body mass tests show mild malnutrition. The arms are disproportionately large in relation to the body of the object, each is about 1.5 m long. The skin is mostly devoid of pigmentation, there are no signs of body hair.
